de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.images

Class AbstractComputeColorHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.images.AbstractComputeColorHistogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComputeColorHistogram, Parameterizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputeHSBColorHistogram, ComputeNaiveRGBColorHistogram

    public abstract class AbstractComputeColorHistogram
extends Object
implements ComputeColorHistogram
    Abstract class for color histogram computation.

    • Method Detail

      • computeColorHistogram

        public double[] computeColorHistogram(File file,
                             File mask)
                               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ComputeColorHistogram
        Compute a color histogram given a file name. The mask file (which may be null) is expected to use >50% transparent or black to mask pixels, Non-transparent white to keep pixels. Alpha values are not used.
        Specified by:
        computeColorHistogram in interface ComputeColorHistogram
        Parameters:
        file - File name
        mask - Mask file (optional)
        Returns:
        Color histogram
        Throws:
        IOException - on file read errors.

      • getNumBins

        Get the number of bins.
        Returns:
        Number of bins

      • getBinForColor

        protected abstract int getBinForColor(int rgb)
        Compute the bin number from a pixel color value.
        Parameters:
        rgb - Pixel color value
        Returns:
        Bin number
